title: Sabancı University Website Instruction Letter (IMIC-S530-01) | Yönerge
text: Instruction No IMIC-S530-01-V05 Effective Date 02-05-2012 Update Date 12-06-2024 Related Unit / Owner MIC / Pazarlama ve Kurumsal İletişim Direktörlüğü Approved by BT / Board of Trustees Aim This document was designed to ensure that external communication activities within Sabancı University's official websites (www.sabanciuniv.edu) are carried out in a planned and controlled manner. Scope All faculties, centers, forums, and academic and administrative units of the university. Principle The websites must be compatible with the institution's communication goals and communication identity. Statutory Basis Definitions / Abbreviations MIC: Marketing and Institutional Communications Unit External web: www.sabanciuniv.edu Regulations 1. Content deemed worthy of publication on the external web: Board news University achievements Faculty member achievements Student achievements Awards received Organized events (Graduation, Promotion Days, Orientation, etc.) University and Global Project announcements Faculty registration announcements Undergraduate and graduate promotion announcements 2. Visuals prepared for the external web must be designed with appropriate dimensions, accurate content, and accurate visuals, and must be approved by MIC. Support for visual preparation can be obtained from MIC, but budgeting and purchasing are required. Visual design technical information: Banner naming: The content name must be written in English characters. Format: .jpg Size: 480x250px Resolution: 72dpi 3. The content must be submitted to MIC by the relevant unit via email in both languages ​​(Turkish and English). 4. After completing the first three steps above, the information is sent to the digital marketing specialist or institutional communications specialist, also via email. 5. After news and announcement entries are approved by MIC, they are entered on the gazeteSU website, the University's news channel, for publication on the website. Entries are published on the external web through the external web transfer mechanism on the gazeteSU website. 6. Within or during external web updates, there are also unplanned projects that are not included in the annual plan and arise from immediate developments and needs. For such projects to begin, preliminary information about the project must be sent to MIC via email as far in advance of the desired project date as possible. 7. Announcements intended for publication on the external web must be submitted to the MIC unit and subsequently go through an approval process for publication. This approval process is designed to ensure that news about Sabancı University is published in the most accurate manner and to protect and enhance the university's reputation. 8. News and announcements approved by MIC are shared on social media through our university's institutional social media accounts and through channels approved by MIC. 9. Website traffic reports may be shared upon request. Related Procedures Related Forms Related Form Links
